casebody.data:
MAHONING CTY. BAR ASSN.
v.
JONES 2010-1462 Supreme Court of Ohio. August 1, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENT

DISCIPLINARY CASE

Sua sponte, James Sidney Jones, Attorney Registration No. 0064099, last known address in Boardman, Ohio, found in contempt for failure to file an affidavit of compliance on or before September 26, 2011.
